unknown_command_text: Unknown command. Please use the menu or /start.
heating_choice_text: What type of heating are you interested in?
heat_pump_location_text: Where will the heat pump be installed?
object_type_prompt: Please describe the type of object (e.g., 'house', 'apartment', 'commercial space', 'weekend house'):
area_input_prompt: Please enter the area of the object in square meters (e.g., '120'):
invalid_area_input: Invalid input. Please enter only a number (e.g., '120').
has_sketch_prompt: Do you have a sketch/project to upload?
upload_sketch_prompt: Please send the sketch/project as an image.
email_for_quote_prompt: Please confirm if everything is correct and enter your email address to send you the quote:
ask_for_email_prompt: Please enter your email address for sending the quote:
invalid_email_format: Invalid email address format. Please try again.
quote_sent_success: Your quote has been successfully sent to your email address. Expect a response soon!
quote_sent_error: An error occurred while sending the quote. Please try again later or contact support.
contact_menu_text: Choose who you want to contact:
contact_info_error: Contact information not found for the selected option.
sending_quote_error: An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again.
